title: Lalpan a hmangaihte ram a buatsaih chu
lyrics:
Lalpan a hmangaihte ram a buatsaih chu,
Khawvel Kanan ram ai pawha nuam zawk chu,
A aw nemin a mite ni tinin min sawm,
A ram nuam taka cheng ve turin.

Ni tinin min sawm thin, a aw nem ngai ila,
A hmangaihna rawn pan la, rawn pan la;
Jordan tuipui fawn mah se,
Aw, Lalpa ramah lo lut rawh u.

Aw, chutah nunna thing leh khawtlang romei,
Thlirin ka ngai, nunna pangpar vulte nen;
Faina lui kam mawi leh chatuan hmun hring nuam ram,
Lalpa hmangaihte an lenna chu.

Aw, chuta chatuan eng kan Lalpa Isua
Leh angel-te nen lawm hla mawi kan sa ang;
Krista hmel entuten sualna an hlau lo vang,
Hlimin amah chu an fak fo vang.
